Pre-Game Insights: In 84 of 139 games this season (60.4%) Springer has gotten a hit, and in 26 of those contests (18.7%) he posted more than one hit.
He has homered in 11.5% of his games in 2024 (16 of 139), 3.2% of his trips to the dish.
Springer has scored at least a run in 56 out of 139 games this year (40.3%), with two or more runs scored in 16 of them (11.5%).
He has tallied at least one RBI in 32 out of 139 games this year (23.0%), with two or more RBI in 14 of those games (10.1%).
Springer has gone down on strikes in 78 of 139 games this season, with multiple punchouts in 28 of them.
